attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYApeAZLHTj9uSySAb_content
attribs.current: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
